author: [Anonymous]
text:
Greetings! 
Has anyone conducted a Fiscal Capacity Study in their administration that they wouldn't mind sharing? I'm in the preparatory stages of this project and would like to review an existing model or study as a reference point. 
Thanks!
title: Fiscal Capacity Study
